content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=-0.5, y=5.5)
Consists of:
-   Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water.
-   PipeGroup transporting water from the pump to the boiler (fluid\_system=6034, pipes include (x=-8.5,y=-0.5) to (x=-7.5,y=2.5)).
-   Boiler at (x=-5.5, y=2.0) consuming water and fuel to produce steam.
-   PipeGroup transporting steam from the boiler to the steam engine (fluid\_system=6038, pipes include (x=-5.5,y=0.5) to (x=-0.5,y=2.5)).
-   Steam Engine (Generator) at (x=-0.5, y=5.5) consuming steam to generate electricity. *Note: Currently not connected to the main power grid (Step 57 Error)*.

### Stone Mining, Smelting, and Wall Production at (x=-62.
